artist: Artist: Gavin Burrows , et al.; Printer: Digaprint, Brighton, U.K.; Publisher: Armchair Comics, Brighton, U.K.; Publisher: Slab-O-Concrete, Hove, U.K.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical illustration of figure and microphone with text and designs printed in color offset lithography on wove paper covers; 38 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: The Plot Thickens
